name: Project Circle (itch)
description:
Overview

A small prototype of a game where you control a bot by entering commands:

  • move forward
  • turn 90°
  • turn 180°
  •  turn 270°

The goal is to reach the finish and collect as much bonuses as possible.

The twist is: you can't control which direction the bot turns, turning direction is flipped after each turn. Looking at the level you have to plan a list of commands considering the switching nature of directions.

Controls

The game is fully controlled by mouse.

Press and drag to pan across the level. Press commands buttons to add the according command to the list of commands. You can drag the list as well.

Feedback

This prototype exists for one sole purpose: to test the concept and gather feedback.

I would really appreciate it if you could provide some feedback. You can contact me on Discord (Exerion#5305),  Reddit, Twitter, or by email.

Cheers!
